        <source_name>GSEPSecurityDashboard</source_name>
        <source_script_field/>
        <source_table/>
        <source_text>var GSEPSecurityDashboard = Class.create();
GSEPSecurityDashboard.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    /**
     * Record an admin login
     *
     * @param {*} event
     */
    adminLoginEvent: function(event) {
        if (this.userHasRole(event.parm1, "admin")) {
            this._addEvent("login_admin", event.sys_created_on, event.user_id.toString(), event.parm2, null);
        }
    },

    /**
     * Record an external user logging in
     *
     * @param {*} event
     */
    externalLoginEvent: function(event) {
        if (this.userHasRole(event.parm1, "snc_external")) {
            this._addEvent("login_external", event.sys_created_on, event.user_id.toString(), event.parm2, null);
        }
    },

    /**
     * Record a ServiceNow login
     *
     * @param {*} event
     */
    serviceNowLoginEvent: function(event) {
        if (event.parm1.contains("@snc")) {
            this._addEvent("login_snc", event.sys_created_on, null, event.parm2.toString(), event.parm1.toString());
        }
    },

    /**
     * Record a failed login attempt
     *
     * @param {*} event
     */
    loginFailed: function(event) {
        var userId = "";
        //Get user sys_id value
        var usrGR = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
        if (usrGR.get("user_name", event.parm1)) {
            userId = usrGR.getUniqueValue();
        }

        this._addEvent("login_failed", event.sys_created_on, userId, event.parm2, null);
    },

    /**
     * Record a security role elevation
     *
     * @param {*} event
     */
    securityElevation: function(event) {
        if (event.parm2 == "security_admin") {
            this._addEvent("security_elevation", event.sys_created_on, event.user_id.toString(), null, null);
        }
    },

    /**
     * Record an impersonation
     *
     * @param {*} event
     */
    userImpersonation: function(event) {
        this._addEvent("impersonation", event.sys_created_on, event.user_id.toString(), null, null);
    },

    /**
     * Record a new IdP being created
     *
     * @param {*} event
     */
    idpAdded: function(createdOn, userID, sourceID) {
        this._addEvent("idp_added", createdOn, userID, null, null, "sso_properties", sourceID);
    },

    /**
     * Record an IdP being modified
     *
     * @param {*} event
     */
    idpModified: function(updatedOn, userID, sourceID) {
        this._addEvent("idp_modified", updatedOn, userID, null, null, "sso_properties", sourceID);
    },

    /**
     * Record a session established from outside the BEN
     *
     * @param {*} event
     */
    offBENSession: function(event) {
        this._addEvent("off_ben_session", event.sys_created_on, event.user_id.toString(), event.parm2, null);
    },

    /**
     * Record an updated local password
     *
     * @param {*} event
     */
    localPasswordChanged: function(updatedOn, userID, sourceID) {
        this._addEvent("local_password_change", updatedOn, userID, null, null, "sys_user", sourceID);
    },

    /**
     * Record a system upgrade
     *
     * @param {*} event
     */
    systemUpgraded: function(event) {
        this._addEvent("system_upgraded", event.sys_created_on, event.user_id.toString(), null, null);
    },

    /**
     * Record a system upgrade failure
     *
     * @param {*} event
     */
    systemUpgradeFailed: function(event) {
        this._addEvent("system_upgrade_failed", event.sys_created_on, event.user_id.toString(), null, null);
    },

    /**
     * Record a GNP IP Access being added
     *
     * @param {*} event
     */
    ipAccessAdded: function(createdOn, userID, sourceID) {
        this._addEvent("ip_access_added", createdOn, userID, null, null, "x_snc_gnp_ip_access", sourceID);
    },

    /**
     * Record a GNP IP Access being modified
     *
     * @param {*} event
     */
    ipAccessModified: function(updatedOn, userID, sourceID) {
        this._addEvent("ip_access_modified", updatedOn, userID, null, null, "x_snc_gnp_ip_access", sourceID);
    },

    /**
     * Record a GNP Elevated Role being added
     *
     * @param {*} event
     */
    elevatedRoleAdded: function(createdOn, userID, sourceID) {
        this._addEvent("elevated_role_added", createdOn, userID, null, null, "x_snc_gnp_elevated_role", sourceID);
    },

    /**
     * Record a GNP Elevated Role being modified
     *
     * @param {*} event
     */
    elevatedRoleModified: function(updatedOn, userID, sourceID) {
        this._addEvent("elevated_role_modified", updatedOn, userID, null, null, "x_snc_gnp_elevated_role", sourceID);
    },

    /**
     * Record a GNP Elevated Role being modified
     *
     * @param {*} event
     */
    roleElevatedPrivilegeModified: function(updatedOn, userID, sourceID) {
        this._addEvent("role_elevated_privilege_modified", updatedOn, userID, null, null, "sys_user_role", sourceID);
    },

    /**
     * Check if a user (by user ID) has a role
     *
     * @param {*} userName
     * @param {*} roleName
     */
    userHasRole: function(userName, roleName) {
        var usrGR = this._getUser("user_name", userName);
        if (usrGR) {
            return this._userHasRole(usrGR.getUniqueValue(), roleName);
        }
        return false;
    },

    /**
     * Check if a user has a role
     *
     * @param {*} userID
     * @param {*} roleName
     */
    _userHasRole: function(userID, roleName) {
        var roleGR = new GlideRecord("sys_user_has_role");
        roleGR.addQuery("user", userID);
        roleGR.addQuery("role.name", roleName);
        roleGR.query();
        return roleGR.hasNext();
    },

    /**
     * Get a User GlideRecord
     *
     * @param {*} fieldName
     * @param {*} fieldValue
     */
    _getUser: function(fieldName, fieldValue) {
        var usrGR = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
        if (usrGR.get(fieldName, fieldValue)) {
            return usrGR;
        }
        return null;
    },

    /**
     * Insert a new Security Event Log record
     *
     * @param {*} type
     * @param {*} createdOn
     * @param {*} user
     * @param {*} ipAddress
     * @param {*} sncUser
     * @param {*} table
     * @returns {String} sys_id of new record
     */
    _addEvent: function(type, createdOn, user, ipAddress, sncUser, table, sourceID) {
        if (gs.nil(type) || gs.nil(createdOn)) {
            gs.error("Missing event type and/or event created on values");
            return null;
        }
        var logGR = new GlideRecord("u_security_event_logs");
        logGR.initialize();
        logGR.u_event_type = type;
        logGR.u_event_created = createdOn;
        if (!gs.nil(user)) {
            logGR.u_user = user;
        }
        if (!gs.nil(ipAddress)) {
            logGR.u_ip_address = ipAddress;
        }
        if (!gs.nil(sncUser)) {
            logGR.u_servicenow_user = sncUser;
        }
        if (!gs.nil(table)) {
            logGR.u_table = table;
        }
        if (!gs.nil(sourceID)) {
            logGR.u_source = sourceID;
        }
        return logGR.insert();
    },

    type: "GSEPSecurityDashboard"
};
</source_text>
